title: Magic Face T3-Tourbillon
summary: The most beautiful mechanical watch face with gears wheeling around !
description: This mechanical interactive watch face is one of the winners in the Watch Face Design Competition, which is held by Magic Watchface and Tencent. http://www.ui.cn/detail/49711.htmlFeatures-Extremely analog watch face with every piece polished carefully-The gears revolve just like real tourbillons-Tap the face, the metal cover will disappear, only spinning gears left-Exclusive design for high resolution smart watches like Huawei Watch, no more blur imagesMagic Face T3-Tourbillon is a timeless masterpiece inspired by many traditional luxury watches, beautiful, elegant, and interactive. Sometimes when you look at it, you could probably think you are wearing a real mechanical watch instead of a digital gadget on your wrist.More facesIf you like T3-Tourbillon, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platformYou can also search magic face  to find more of our works.Supported Devices:T3-Tourbillon supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.About us:We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.Contact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Website:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter：https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface
descriptionHTML:
This mechanical interactive watch face is one of the winners in the Watch Face Design Competition, which is held by Magic Watchface and Tencent. http://www.ui.cn/detail/49711.html

Features
-Extremely analog watch face with every piece polished carefully
-The gears revolve just like real tourbillons
-Tap the face, the metal cover will disappear, only spinning gears left
-Exclusive design for high resolution smart watches like Huawei Watch, no more blur images

Magic Face T3-Tourbillon is a timeless masterpiece inspired by many traditional luxury watches, beautiful, elegant, and interactive. Sometimes when you look at it, you could probably think you are wearing a real mechanical watch instead of a digital gadget on your wrist.

More faces
If you like T3-Tourbillon, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform
You can also search magic face to find more of our works.

Supported Devices:
T3-Tourbillon supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

About us:
We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.
We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.
We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

comments: I love the looks of this but... It won't load on my Tag Heuer Connected watch.  Could this be caused by the Intel processor inside the  Tag? This is the only face that refuses to download.  Fix to get 5 stars.
color change? I'll give it a 5 once we have the option to change the color for it. I'd rather have blue than purple.
Par4him Can't download it to my tag heuer connected. Restarted several times and still doesn't work
